comment: Takes attendance (worth about 6% of your grade), 4 easymedium difficulty exams (drops lowest), 2 semester long projects, & a homework assignmentlab every class (I did summer semester). Also offers extra credit to go to the doctor, volunteer work, andor big fitness events. Overall, the class is easy and boring. Book is mandatory for homeworklabs

This a late entry I took his class over the Summer and it was a cake-walk! This guy is really calm and collected; has his own website where you'll find everything you need but you gotta buy the textbook/CD for workbook homework. Easy 3 tests and even easier multiple extra credit opportunities

Love dr. d.  He is a really sweet man and will help you however he can.  I've heard some people say that he is intimidating but, I chalk it up to his calm demeanor.  Get to know him, he a great guy and good prof. with a lot of connections.
Forgive me for my typos (previous entry)- this is the reason one should never type in the dark.

Wonderful teacher; calm demeanor, overall good personality and very knowledgeable.  Liked him so much I'd even let my Mom date him which is why I gave him the "Hot" rating as apposed to the "Not" rating.  I give him an A too.
Dr. D is great. He will help you with anything as long as you ask. Attendance is part of your grade. Lectures are powerpoint. Test arn't hard if you study. No reason you can't get an A.
Super easy class, but super boring too.  Wouldn't recommend taking this in the summer; you'll fall asleep for sure.  Good professor, though, always willing to help you out.
Nice guy, very helpful and sweet.  Lectures are boring and not very relevant.

I was pregnant and still made an A. What more would you like? Don't slack, go and workout with him and keep him posted if you have any medical problem - he will go out of his way to work with you! Fun and usefull class! I got out of it a lot more than I expected.
Wonderful! Was not happy about taking this class but Dr. D changed my views. Thanks Dr. D. You are the BEST!

mr donovan was an EASY teacher. he gives lab assignments, there is no reason that you should not get an A on your labs. there are 3 tests, they are kinda tricky even if you read the powerpoint slides. but just aim for a B on the test, and turn in all of your assignments and you will definitely get an A!
Very Nice. Great sense of humor. Higly recommend.

A great teacher, he really understands that students take HPS 1000 b/c they have to, and he does not go over the top or make his tests extremely hard.  He is very understanding and laid back.  Get him if you can!!
